name: Tracker
description: This algorithm is based on the disting EX algorithm of the same name. It tracks the pitch and envelope of an audio signal, which are output as CVs. The pitch shifter part of the EX algorithm was split out into a separate algorithm on the NT. The algorithm can also generate chords to harmonise with the tracked pitch â€“ either as pitch CVs (to drive VCOs etc.) or as pitch shifter CVs (to drive the Pitch Shifter, to make harmony copies of the tracked audio). The chords can be tuned microtonally using Scala or MTS.
use_cases: Tracking monophonic audio signals for MIDI note output or CV control
Generating harmony chords based on tracked pitch
Pitch shifting tracked audio with microtonal accuracy
Creating backing tracks that bend expressively with a solo part
gui_description: The display shows the tracked note at the bottom of the screen, as a MIDI note number plus cents and as a frequency in Hz. To the right is a bar showing the envelope and tuning deviation from true pitch. Above this are the closest note within the current scale (left) and four harmony notes (right).

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: Sets the range of pitches which can be tracked. Set this appropriately for the lowest note that you need to track.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: Sets the MIDI channel on which to receive notes if the harmony mode is 'MIDI'.

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: The audio input bus for pitch and envelope tracking.

output_ports.name: Pitch output
output_ports.description: Outputs the tracked pitch as a CV (MIDI note number + cents).

output_ports.name: Env output
output_ports.description: Outputs the envelope following signal as a CV.

output_ports.name: Change trigger out
output_ports.description: Emits a trigger pulse when the current tracked note changes.

output_ports.name: Chord 1 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV for the first chord note (harmony).

output_ports.name: Chord 2 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV for the second chord note (harmony).

output_ports.name: Chord 3 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV for the third chord note (harmony).

output_ports.name: Chord 4 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV for the fourth chord note (harmony).

output_ports.name: Shift 1 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV for the first pitch shifter.

output_ports.name: Shift 2 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV for the second pitch shifter.

output_ports.name: Shift 3 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV for the third pitch shifter.
